fields.name: 👉 Respect & Conduct
fields.value:
▸ Treat all guild members and the broader WoW community with respect and courtesy.
▸ Griefing, trolling, or intentionally disrupting others' gameplay is not tolerated.
▸ Be kind to PUGs—your behavior reflects on the guild.

fields.name: 👉 Humor & Sensitivity
fields.value:
▸ Humor is welcome and encouraged! However, if you're offended, speak up respectfully, then let it go. 
▸ If someone is offended by your joke: Apologize, then move on.
▸ No need to dwell—keep the atmosphere light and inclusive.

fields.name: 👉 Off-Limits Topics in Guild Chat
fields.value:
To maintain a welcoming environment, please avoid the following in guild chat:
▸ Sexually explicit content
▸ Political discussions
▸ Religious debates
▸ Racist or discriminatory remarks

fields.name: 👉 Inactivity
fields.value:
▸ Members are marked as "inactive" after 3 months of no logins across all linked characters.
▸ If you plan to be away, let us know! We’ll work with you to determine next steps and keep your spot warm.

fields.name: 👉 Inviting New Members
fields.value:
Only invite:
▸ Alts of current members.
▸ Verified friends of current members.
▸ Confirm the name of their main character and notify the Co-GM for proper notes.

fields.name: 👉 Guild Vault Etiquette
fields.value:
The guild vault is a shared resource built by member contributions. Please follow these rules:
▸ Withdraw only what you need for the character you're currently playing.
▸ Use items on that character only.
▸ Do not transfer items to non-guild characters.
▸ Do not withdraw items if you're planning to leave the guild.
▸ Do not sell or vendor guild vault items.
▸ Theft will result in removal and a permanent ban.

fields.name: 👉 Avoiding Cliques
fields.value:
Cliques lead to drama. We’re here to build a community, not exclusive circles. We want everyone to run content together! Dungeons, raids, mythics—group play builds camaraderie. When forming groups:
▸ Ask in guild chat first.
▸ Accept volunteers on a first-come, first-served basis.
▸ Avoid private invites unless you're continuing with an existing group.
▸ Discord is encouraged for mythics and coordination.

fields.name: 👉 Complaints & Concerns
fields.value:
▸ If something bothers you, speak up—privately to the Guild Leader or Co-Founder.
▸ We’d rather fix small issues early than deal with big ones later.
▸ Most problems are solvable with communication.

fields.name: 👉 Drama-Free Zone
fields.value:
▸ Drama is disruptive and exhausting. Don’t start it, fuel it, or ignore it.
▸ If there's a problem, report it privately to leadership.
▸ We’ll handle it swiftly and fairly.

title: Welcome to Compulsion 🐉
description:
We're thrilled to have you here! Compulsion is a World of Warcraft guild built on respect, progression, and community. Before you dive in, please take a moment to read our rules.

   **React with the ✅ emoji below to accept the rules and gain access to the server.**

footer.text: Compulsion - built on trust, forged in battle
